experiencie.name: Dictado de Taller UI Desing
experiencie.summary: In charge of teaching the UI Design workshop course at the Sollertia school, I promoted the Design of websites or mobile applications as an aid to the proposed solutions of each student, promoting the use of their creativity
highlights: Create sketches that will help with future designs
Create friendly and attractive designs in Figma and/or Adobe XD
Verify that the design meets the requested needs

experiencie.name: Dictado de Taller UI Desing
experiencie.summary: In charge of teaching the Web Development workshop course at the Sollertia school, I encouraged the creation of websites previously designed by each student, promoting their logic and creativity through the use of HTML tag code and CSS styling language
highlights: Know how UI designs serve as a basis for future designs made with web code
Add styles with CSS to previously made designs

experiencie.name: Dictado de Taller UI Desing
